ShipmentCongratsText1: 恭喜！已成功透過Fryate 管理系統建立新貨運訂單
ShipmentCongratsText2: 客戶將會透過收到關於新貨運訂單的提示電郵
ShipmentCongratsText3: 另外，我們已爲你建立登入憑證，確認電郵已經傳送至你已提供的電郵帳戶
ShipmentCongratsText4: 下一次使用我們的服務，你可使用憑證登入系統建立新訂單，更快捷方便

ShipmentViaFrayteWarehouse: 透過 FRAYTE 倉庫出貨
VATNo: 增值稅/商品及服務稅號碼

CustomerAndOtherIssue: 如遇到海關或其他問題，令送貨受阻，請說明
FrayteShipmentValidText: 部分資料不完整或沒有正確完成所有設定新貨運訂單的步驟
FrayteShipmentValidReCheckText: 請重新檢查第 1 步的貨運訂單資料（地址資料部分）
CheckShipmentInformation: 或按下「上一步」按鍵檢查資料是否正確
CustomerConfirmShipThankyou: 感謝確認貨運訂單。你的訂單正在處理中
CustomerConfirmShipThankyouTxt: 你將收到有關貨運的電郵，你也可以登入到 FRAYTE 查看貨件的目前狀態
ErrorWhileCommunicatingServer: 嘗試與伺服器連線時發生錯誤，請稍候再試。
EmailAddressNotFound: 找不到電郵地址，請使用正確的電郵地址再試一次
PleaseEnterValidUserPass: 請輸入正確的用戶名稱/密碼
PleaseSelectValidFile: 請選擇有效的檔案。支援的檔案類型包括：圖片、PDF、Word 檔案、Excel 和文字檔案
AnticipatedDateTimeUpdatedSuccessfully: 成功更新預計日期和時間
CouldNotUpdateAnticipatedDateTime: 無法更新預計日期和時間。
CouldNotFindShipmentConfirmationDetail: 無法找到貨運詳細資料。請透過電郵上的確認連結查詢。
MailSentToConsigneeGoodsPickup: 已經發送電郵到成功取貨的收件人
ErrorSavingShipment: 儲存貨運資料時發生錯誤
ErrorGettingShipmentDetailServer: 從伺服器獲取貨運資料時發生錯誤
HeadquarterHongKong: FRAYTE物流有限公司香港總部，為您的物流需求提供一切可靠的解決方法
OurAim: 我們的目標是確保貨運和物流活動，以不斷滿足您的需求和期望，同時降低你的操作成本
Head: 總部
FeelFreeToContact: 今天請隨時聯繫我們，我們的專業小組將為您提供最高水準的服務
WideRangeOfCLient: FRAYTE物流有限公司擁有世界各地廣泛的客戶基礎，他們都期望最好的服務，最短的運輸時間和最低成本。我們為能給他們提供服務感到自豪。以下是一些我們與客戶合作的例子。
DedicatedTeamDescription: FRAYTE物流有限公司成立了專業團隊，致力於提供全方位的優質客戶服務。擁有多元化的全球團隊，我們能為您提供卓越的國際化物流服務，讓您感覺如像在當地一樣。
WhatDocumentNeeded: 安排一個裝運需要提供什麼檔
MakeShipment: 安排裝運的時候我們需要您提供以下檔以確保能順利運輸
DetermineActualWeightDesc: 實際重量是指實際裝在袋子裡、信封或箱子裡的商品重量，稱重時會四捨五入到最接近的千克數（KG）
CalculateVolumetricWeightDesc: 請把裝貨的箱子長度x寬度x高度/5000，我們在出貨的時候會四捨五入到最接近的千克數(KG)
DetermineBillableWeightDesc: 但確定了這批貨的實際重量和體積重後，我們會比較出最大者，取其作為收費重量。這是用於計算帳單上最終的收費價目。
HowDoCompletePaperWork: 我應怎樣完成文書工作？
HowDoCompletePaperWorkDesc: 我們準備了下面的一些範例，供您參考應如何完成文書工作。 如果你有更多疑問請隨時聯繫我們FRAYTE物流有限公司的代表作更詳盡的瞭解詢問。
WhatIsTransitTimeOfGoods: 我的貨物運輸時間是多久？
WhatIsTransitTimeOfGoodsDesc: 請參考我們的價目表和區域運輸時間表
WhatIsMaxWeight: 最大的裝運重量是多大
WhatIsMaxWeightDesc: 最大的裝運重量是多大
WhatIsMaxLengthOfSinglePackage: 每一個包裝最長的長度是多少？
AirFreightDesc: 航空貨運選項適合移動大量的重型或笨重貨物從A地區到b地區，在進口或出口方面我們的專門小組都樂意提供幫助。
PortToPortDoorToDoor: 港口至港口，門至門服務
SeaFreightLCLDesc: 對於裝不滿一整個貨櫃的但仍需走海運的小票貨物，最小要達到2.5CBM，我們能為您安排散貨拼櫃的服務（LCL）。
SeaFreightFCLDesc: FRAYTE物流有限公司能為您提供完整的裝櫃（FCL）服務，我們會為您提供每週到主要港口的航運時間表。這項服務適合非緊急、體積大、重型、收費裝載量大的貨物運輸。
CourierDesc: 我們的快遞運輸網路覆蓋了全球200多個國家，因而能為你提供最快的全球運輸服務，我們還能提供貨物流動資訊，讓您能及時追蹤貨物動態。
EXPRYESDesc: 如果你需要比快遞服務還要快的服務，我們的直飛服務非常適合您最緊急的運輸需求。擁有最強的靈活性和最快的速度，我們能提供更長的截倉時間，通過我們現存的運輸網路提供門到門的送貨服務。
CoveringMajorCitiesAndBusinessHubs: 覆蓋主要城市與商業中心
HandCarryDesc: 我們在全球各地擁有龐大的運輸網路和專業小組，我們能為你提供私人手帶貨物服務，親自交付你的貨物。從開始到最後交貨的全程您都可以即時追蹤到貨運資訊。若您有非常重要的貨物或非常緊急的貨物要交付，我們強烈推薦這個專屬服務。
LocalHKTruckingDelivery: 香港本地卡車送貨服務
Items_Not_Transport: 什麼物品是不能運輸的?
See_Previous_Address: 請點擊和參看之前的位址

AddEdit_ShipmentAccount: 添加/ 編輯裝運帳戶
Lost_data: 這個行為會讓您丟失當前訂艙單的資料
TaxandDuties_Message: 誰將支付本次運輸的稅金
TrackingMessage_DetailPage: 請上FRAYTE.co.uk 追蹤物流網頁查詢詳情
PrintLabel_Message: 如果標籤顯示紅色代表已經被下載了
Increased_Overall_Costs: 燃料價格的變化導致了交通行業的總體成本增加,迫使燃油附加費可能上升,下降或移除，這會與燃油價格走勢一致。
Continuingrise_fuelprices: 由於燃料價格持續上漲，FRAYTE物流有限公司認為有需要增加燃油附加費。
Time_Validation: 日期必須要後於當前日期

ShipmentCancel_Note: 請注意：不是所有運輸都能免費取消的.

請至少選擇一種物流類型。

Dedicated_Service_Team: 你希望從我們專門的客戶服務團隊專門派人跟進嗎？
By_filling_validation: 請確認你填寫的海關簽名和報關的資訊是真實和正確的。FRATYE物流有限公司不負責由此造成的任何問題或因此造成的延遲裝運。

NotValid_TrackingCode: 您輸入的是無效的查詢號碼。查詢號碼應該像這樣的：PM_123456_654321
Find_Order_Detail: 您可以在您的帳戶裡找到訂單細節。
Click_Valid_Tracking_Code: 點擊這裡並輸入有效的查詢號碼.
FRAYTE_Booking_Confirmation: 感謝使用Frayte物流有限公司。Thank you for using FRAYTE Ltd. 我們的系統正在處理你的裝運資訊，這個過程可能需要60秒，請耐心等待。一旦完成你的訂單資訊將會自動確認。

TrackingPageToTtrackthe_Detail: tracking page to track the detail3
LetterParcelCan_NotGreaterThanTwo: Letter parcel can not be greater then 2 kg3
ThankYouFor_UsingFRAYTELogisticsLtd: Thank you for using FRAYTE Logistics Ltd. We are now processing your Shipment in our system, which can3
Please_RemainOn_This_Screen: Please remain on this screen. You will be directed automatically to our Booking Confirmation screen upon completion.3
PleaseWaitWhile_Get_Rate: Please wait while we prepare your quote...3
ThankYouFor_UsingFRAYTELogisticsLtdRate: Thank you for using FRAYTE Logistics Ltd. We are now processing your request for a quote in our system, which can3
Please_RemainOn_This_ScreenRate: Please remain on this screen. You will be directed automatically to our quotation confirmation screen upon completion.3
AllQuote_Issue_FRAYTE: All quotes issued are subject to FRAYTE Logistics Ltd final acceptance and full Terms & Conditions.3
IDECLAREMYSHIPMENT_CONTAINSNON_HAZARDOUS: I DECLARE MY SHIPMENT CONTAINS NON HAZARDOUS CONTENT !3
Direct_Booking_Hover: Direct Booking system is a courier booking platform, allowing you to compare and generate shipping labels for many of the leading couriers, both internationally and domestically. Our online system will allow you to choose the right courier for the job.3
Direct_Booking_Warehousing: Warehousing (WMS) system allows you to keep up to date with your stock that is in store in one of our global warehouses. Pick requests can either be uploaded or entered manually, giving you total control of your inventory on a global basis with a click of a button. Alongside of this our dedicated team of drivers and vehicles provide the very best in terms of distribution.3
Direct_Booking_Breakbulk: Breakbulk allows you to have multiple consignments consolidated and labeled at origin. Air or Sea freighted from origin to destination before being Customs cleared by one Importer on Record before being injected into a local domestic delivery network. Giving you a door to door fulfillment solution on a global basis.3
Direct_Booking_Ecommerce: eCommerce product allows you to choose from our wide range of distribution services for your online business fulfillment needs. Specialists in handling large numbers of small packets from both branded courier solutions to unbranded solutions, giving you a product that is quicker than the postal networks but slower, and lower in cost, than the express courier.3
Direct_Booking_Tradelane: Tradelane booking service is set up for Air and Sea Freight (LCL and FCL) for regular shipment bookings from multiple sources at origin to delivery to your warehouse / office at destination. The systematic approach of the software allows you consistent handling for all shipments.3
Direct_Booking_Express_Air: Looking for some thing in a hurry. Express Solutions have three unique products from booking a Next Flight Out (NFO), On Board Courier hand carry service across the globe, to arranging a true next day Express Courier service all over the world. We have the solutions for your EXPRESS Shipments.3
TotalEstimate_BillingWeightGetServices: Total estimated charges may vary depending on actual billable weight, All Services are subject to FRAYTE Logistic Ltd. final acceptance and full Terms and Conditions.3
Square_Format: click here to view address in list format3
Grid_Format: click here to view address in grid format3
Agree_Term_And_Condition: agree to our Terms and Conditions
Special_Offer_Valid: 1. The above special offer is valid for an ad hoc shipment and is subject to final acceptance of full Terms and Conditions.3
Not_Responing_Taxes_Duties: 3. FRAYTE Logistics Ltd. is not responsible for any duties or taxes imposed by the destinations country.3
Shipment_Charges_Volumetric_Weight: 4. Shipment Charges are based on volumetric weight (Length cm x Width cm x Depth cm / 5000); 200 kg / 1CBM or gross weight, whichever is the greater.3
Only_General_Cargo_Quote: 5. Quote is for General cargo only.3
eCommerce_Paragraph: eCommerce product allows you to choose from our wide range of distribution services for your online business fulfillment needs. Specialists in handling large numbers of small packets from both branded courier solutions to unbranded solutions, giving you a product that is quicker than the postal networks but slower, and lower in cost, than the express courier.3
FRAYTE_Forwarding_Paragraph: Trade lane booking service is set up for Air and Sea Freight (LCL and FCL) for regular shipment bookings from multiple sources at origin to delivery to your warehouse / office at destination. The systematic approach of the software allows you consistent handling for all shipments.3
Courier_Paragraph: Direct Booking system is a courier booking platform, allowing you to compare and generate shipping labels for many of the leading couriers, both internationally and domestically. Our online system will allow you to choose the right courier for the job.3

Remaining_Characters: Shipment Reference is required and can have3
ProofOfDelivery_Detail: Once our team has delivered your consignment, either locally or on the other side of the globe, we will email you with proof of delivery (Daily, Weekly, and Monthly). The timing of this notification is dependent on which service you have chosen.3
ProofOfDelivery_Last_Line: Should you need any further assistance we would ask that you contact3
FRAYTE_Logistics_Ltd_will_provide_you_wi: FRAYTE Logistics Ltd. will provide you with the login to our direct booking system allowing you to place the booking online. Upon placing the booking you will be able to create, download and print the labels that are needed for the shipment.3
If_you_book_your_consignments_online: If you book your consignments online then our online system can automatically store the consignee’s address and also produce the following documentation:3
In_Order_To_Save_Any_Unnecessary: In order to save any unnecessary holdups with your delivery once it reaches its destination, if the consignment is dutiable and is consigned to a country outside of the EU (i.e Non EU Country), the courier would need a Commercial Invoice before they are able to pick up the consignment. Should you need any assistance with this please feel free to contact us3
Transit_Times_Vary_From_Courier: Transit times vary from courier to courier. In order to get the most up to date transit time information we would request you get in contact with one of our team3
Howeverit_Shouldbe_Noted: However it should be noted, while we always quote estimated transit times nothing is guaranteed and delays can occur due to Customs and flight delays which are outside FRAYTE Logistics Ltd.’s control.3
The Advantage_You_Will_Have_Is: The advantage you will have is, unlike many other courier companies, we are able to keep you up to date with your shipment every step of the way in the form of consolidated tracking information, even if you are using multiple courier companies both domestically and internationally.3
If_You_Need_Any_Further_Help_OR_Customiz: If you need any further help or customization for this then please feel free to call a member of our team to help.3
FRAYTE_Logistics_Ltd_Is_Able_To_Provide_: FRAYTE Logistics Ltd is able to provide state of the art tracking services. This will ensure that you are always able to find and track your shipment when it is moving around the globe. We have our online tracking website at3
If_You_Need_Further_Help: If you need further help we are always around and happy to help at FRAYTE Logistics Ltd. Feel free to drop us an email3
Our_Team_Will_Be_More_Than_Happy_To_Help: or give us a call and one of our team will be more than happy to help you and guide you through the process. Make sure before you call you have the following information ready:3
